instruction: Describe a scenario for using the product
output: You can use the Amazon Echo to set reminders and alarms, play your favorite music or podcasts, make hands-free calls and video calls with contacts, check the weather and your calendar, manage shopping lists, control smart home devices, and more. For example, you can ask the Echo to turn on the lights, adjust the thermostat, or start the coffee maker in your home. You can also ask it to stream your favorite radio station, read the news and other content aloud, or play your music library. The Amazon Echo makes it easy to stay connected and in control of your home.
